articles.title: Phil Spencer pays tribute to 'fierce leader' Jim Ryan following his retirement announcement | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: Head of Xbox Phil Spencer has paid tribute to PlayStation boss Jim Ryan following the news that Ryan will be retiring from the gaming giant next year.
articles.content:

articles.title: Millions wrongly labelled with penicillin allergy, pharmacists warn - BBC
articles.description: Many people are needlessly avoiding the most common antibiotics, which are the most effective.
articles.content:
Millions of people wrongly believe they are allergic to penicillin, which could mean they take longer to recover after an infection, pharmacists say.
About four million people in the UK have the dru… [+2620 chars]

articles.title: Meet 'Dogxim,' the world's first known dog-fox hybrid—and a genetic oddity - National Geographic
articles.description: “What a strange hybrid beast!” When first found, the animal was a mystery, showing traits common in both dogs and foxes.
articles.content:
In 2021, a dog-like animal was brought to an animal rehabilitation center in southern Brazil, after it was hit by a car. Soon after, veterinarians noticed unusual behavior.
